articles.content:
Crackdown on S. Korean Patriotic Figures Denounced 
    Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The National Reconciliation Council in a statement on June 9 says the south Korean judicial authorities' recent crackdown on Jong Jae Uk, chairman of the 11th- term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils, and Min Kyong U, secretary of the Reunification Solidarity, is a vicious challenge to the aspiration and desire of the fellow countrymen to achieve peace of the country and its independent reunification through national cooperation in the spirit of "By our nation itself" and an undisguised betrayal of the June 15 joint declaration.
 It is obviously an open provocation against the north to vilify and insult the north, the dialogue partner, as "an anti-state organization" and subject the pro-reunification patriotic figures to harsher repression by linking them with the north, brandishing the "Security Law", a leftover of the confrontation era, says the statement.    
 It urges the south Korean authorities to make a bold decision to abolish the "Security Law" hindering the reconciliation and unity of the nation and stop the murderous trials of pro-reunification patriotic figures and unconditionally release the figures under arrest.

articles.content:
President of SPA Presidium Receives Credentials from Bangladesh�@Ambassador
    Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, was presented with credentials by Ashfaqur Rahman, Bangladeshi ambassador e.p. to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
 Present there were Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Yong Il and officials of the Bangladesh embassy.    
 After receiving the credentials Kim Yong Nam had a talk with the Bangladeshi ambassador.

articles.title: Poster of Kimjongilia Show to Celebrate June 19 Published
articles.content:
Poster of Kimjongilia Show to Celebrate June 19 Published
    Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- A poster of Kimjongilia show to celebrate June 19 was published. The show will be held on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
 Seen in the centre of the poster are Kimjongilia, a flower of the sun, in full bloom and the mark of the WPK.    
 Written in the upper part are "June 19 celebration" and "Kimjongilia Show" and in the lower part letters that the show will be held at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition from June 17 to 23, Juche 93 (2004).
